name: In re ADOPTION OF M. L. W. Appeal of P. J. W. and S. B. W.
name_abbreviation: In re Adoption of M. L. W.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ADOPTION OF M. L. W. Appeal of P. J. W. and S. B. W.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County is affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stephen R. Signore, Jr., Norristown, for appellant.
Jay C. Glickman, Souderton, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 503
In re ADOPTION OF M. L. W. Appeal of P. J. W. and S. B. W.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 15, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Stephen R. Signore, Jr., Norristown, for appellant.
Jay C. Glickman, Souderton, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
